# Graphical representation on  world map 

## Load the libraries 

```{r}
library(memisc)
library(assertthat)
library(sqldf)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
library(oz)
library(scatterpie)
library(rgdal)
library(maptools)
library(maps)
library(mapplots)
```

```{r}
mutations
```


## Plot 


```{r}
worldmap <- map_data ("world")

mapplot1 <- ggplot(worldmap) + 
  geom_map(data = worldmap, map = worldmap, aes(x = long, y = lat, map_id = region), fill=NA, color="black") +
  coord_quickmap() +
  theme_bw()

mapplot1 +  
  geom_scatterpie(data = mutations, aes(x= , y = )) 

mapplot1

```
